Package com.app.service.impl

Class QuestServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.service.impl.QuestServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
QuestService
@Service public class QuestServiceImpl extends Object implements QuestService
Implementation of the QuestService interface, providing functionalities for managing quests.
